faqs.q: How many calories in a skinny margarita?
faqs.a: Approximately 110 calories per serving with fresh ingredients and minimal sweetener.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between skinny and regular margarita?
faqs.a: A regular margarita has 200-300 calories due to sugary mixers; skinny cuts it by using fresh juice and less sugar.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a skinny margarita?
faqs.a: Yes, about 9.5 g carbs, mainly from lime juice and agave, with 7.8 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does a skinny margarita have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Negligible fat (0 g) and protein (0.2 g); it's primarily alcohol and carbs.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie skinny margarita?
faqs.a: Swap agave for stevia or use more lime and less tequila to reduce calories further.
